# estimated(_:)

**Type Method**

Creates a dimension with an estimated point value.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func estimated(_ estimatedDimension: CGFloat) -> Self
```

## Discussion

The final size of the dimension is determined when the content is rendered.

## Creating a dimension

- **absolute(_:)**: Creates a dimension with an absolute point value.
- **fractionalHeight(_:)**: Creates a dimension that is computed as a fraction of the height of the containing group.
- **fractionalWidth(_:)**: Creates a dimension that is computed as a fraction of the width of the containing group.

items.description: Creates a dimension with an absolute point value.
